title: Snoop's Son -- I Only Played Football For Dad's Affection ... He Loves Me Anyway
text:
Snoop's Son -- I Only Played Football For Dad's Affection ... He Loves Me Anyway 
Published By: TMZ.com - Today 
A bombshell revelation from Snoop's son Cordell Broadus -- who just admitted he only played football because he thought it was the only way ...
